# CAM::IS_CINEMATIC_CAM_INPUT_ACTIVE

## Summary
Is the cinematic input active by script or user input

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Tests some cinematic camera flags
